member.summary: Method responsible for analyzing the image that the user registered in the system, thus returning the plate value

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BrandController.Get
member.summary: This method is responsible for listing all brands registered in the system. Only the administrator has access to this data.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BrandController.Post(FunilariaDev.Domains.Brand)
member.summary: This method is responsible for registering new brands

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BrandController.Update(System.Int32,FunilariaDev.Domains.Brand)
member.summary: This method is responsible for updating the vehicle brands based on the ID that is informed and new parameters for a given brand. Only the administrator can change this information.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BrandController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is responsible for deleting a model by the ID informed by the administrator. Only the System Administrator has access.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BudgetController.Get
member.summary: This method is responsible for listing all budgets registered in the system. Only the administrator has access to this data.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BudgetController.Post(FunilariaDev.Domains.Budget)
member.summary: Method responsible for registering new budgets, having as a parameter a previously registered service, vehicle model and estimated value

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BudgetController.Put(System.Int32,FunilariaDev.Domains.Budget)
member.summary: Method responsible for updating registered budgets. Only the administrator has access to this method.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BudgetController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method must delete a budget based on the id provided by the administrator

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.BudgetController.GetBudget(System.String)
member.summary: In theory this method should return a budget based on the customer's car model, making a search in the database and returning the object with the value and the problem

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.CarController.Post(FunilariaDev.Domains.Car)

member.returns: A Token with User information or a NotFound(400) status code with a custom error message

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ModelController.Get
member.summary: This method is responsible for listing all models registered in the system. Only the administrator has access to this data.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ModelController.Post(FunilariaDev.Domains.Model)
member.summary: This method is responsible for registering new models based on the brands previously registered by the administrator

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ModelController.Update(System.Int32,FunilariaDev.Domains.Model)

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ModelController.Delete(System.Int32)

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ServiceController.Post(FunilariaDev.Domains.Service)
member.summary: This method is responsible for registering a service to be used as a parameter for the Pre-Budget. Only the Administrator has access to this method.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ServiceController.Update(System.Int32,FunilariaDev.Domains.Service)
member.summary: This method is responsible for updating a previously registered service and is identified by the ID and its new past data callable inputs. Only the Administrator can update.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ServiceController.Delete(FunilariaDev.Domains.Service)
member.summary: This method is responsible for deleting a registered service that is identified through the ID that is informed. Only the Administrator has access to this method.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.ServiceController.Get
member.summary: This method is responsible for listing all services registered in the system. Only the administrator has access to this data.

member.name: M:FunilariaDev.Controllers.UserController.Get
